|powledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |connactled = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |spdledcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |leddupcolor = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimmin = <!-- Size of device --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device -->
}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is is original (Nordic low power protocol only!) wireless connectivity dongle for the EPOC. It's probably compatible with most EEG models produced by Emotiv that use the Nordic protocol. It's using... * [http://www.cypress.com/?docID=26942 '''Cypress Semiconductor''' CY7C64215 ('''enCoRe III''') Full-Speed (12Mbps) USB Controller] for the HID interface * [http://www.nordicsemi.com/eng/Products/2.4GHz-RF/nRF24L01 '''Nordic Semiconductor''' nRF24L01 Ultra Low Power 2.4GHz RF transceiver IC] for wireless interface
Specifically, this device will likely work with the... *[[Emotiv EPOC]] *[[Emotiv Insight]] *[[Emotiv EPOC+]]
<!-- The reciever noted on their store is noted as the 04 reciever. I do not know what differences exist between that receiver and those distributed with earlier units. Also, the reciever differed (at the very least, cosmetically) between devkit units and non-devkit units. -->
